name: Idle Balls Tap Itch
description:
"Idle Balls Tap Itch" is created with high Artificial intelligence that not only supports your running game score, it also take over controls while you are away even sleeping or your game is out of focus due to an incoming call or while you are using chat messengers. You just have to earn more to increase your bouncy balls, fidgets, atoms, bouncing fruits, dough nuts and cup cakes to score for you when you put game idle or out of focus.
You can take your control back and start taping with multiple fingers along with your fired balls and other bouncing stuff.
Idle ball is just another version of tension, anger and frustration releasing game like fidgets. It is more fun way of tapping fingers while you are thinking about something serious matter.
Idle balls is in between endless and end able gameplay. Some players says it is endless and some say it has an end after quadrillion score.
Who knows?
* ** Idle Balls Tap Itch GamePlay ***

"Idle Balls Tap Itch" is perfectly a Clicker tap tap Game which is made really simple for you to play ! One tap or Multiple taps it’s up to you. Isn't it so simple?
Press the red idle balls to lower their value. You can also level up bouncy balls, fidget, atom, cupcake, wheel, soccer ball, and some power ups to play and destroy mad bubbles faster ! every thing is just free. Play "Idle Balls Tap Itch" along with player friendly AI to increase your balls and other items level and destroy red idle bubbles as much as you can.
Please tell us your thoughts by giving reviews about this game.
Enjoy and have fun!!!
